text: Viktor Danilovich Saneyev (Georgia (country) ვიქტორ სანაევი 3 October 1945 - 3 January 2022) was a Georgian triple jumper. He competed internationally for the USSR and won four Olympic medals; three golds (1968, 1972 and 1976) and one silver (1980). He was born in Sukhumi, Georgian SSR. Saneyev died on 3 January 2022 in Sydney, Australia, three months after his 76th birthday.Умер легендарный Виктор Санеев ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Triple jumpers Category:Olympians for Georgia (country) Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union
title: Viktor Saneyev
